Package com.teamfour.monopolish.gui.controllers

Class ChatController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamfour.monopolish.gui.components.chat.ChatController
  • public class ChatController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for chat GUI. It will handle all logic related to chat communication with the database, refreshing, notifications and updating the chat.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChatController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addChatMessage()
      Sends a string text from the chat input box to the chat
      static java.util.Timer getChatTimer()
      Get chat timer to be able to stop timer if needed.
      void initialize()
      Will run once on mount/render
      void toggleChat()
      This method will open or close the chat, depending if the chat is open or closed.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
